scripts.optimize-css1: postcss public/css/style.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output public/dist/style.css
scripts.optimize-css2: postcss public/css/responsive.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output public/dist/responsive.css
scripts.optimize-css3: postcss public/css/registration.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output public/dist/registration.css
scripts.optimize-css4: postcss public/css/planner.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output public/dist/planner.css
scripts.optimize-css5: postcss public/css/navbar.css --use autoprefixer cssnano postcss-pxtorem --output public/dist/navbar.css
scripts.build: npm run optimize-css1 && npm run optimize-css2 && npm run optimize-css3 && npm run optimize-css4 && npm run optimize-css5 && npm run transpile-js1 && npm run transpile-js2 && npm run transpile-js3 && npm run minify-js1 && npm run minify-js2 && npm run minify-js3
